汕.definition: bamboo fish trap; used in names of places connected with Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2]

汕尾市.definition: Shanwei, prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3dong1 Sheng3]

汕頭.definition: see 汕頭市|汕头市[Shan4tou2 Shi4]

汕頭市.definition: Shantou, prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3dong1 Sheng3]
